medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The mass was noted to be enlarging on follow-up MR imaging. The patient has a history of tuberous sclerosis and associated retinal lesions.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of tuberous sclerosis with retinal lesions. Seizure disorders are noted in family history.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has a history of seizure disorder.
